recipeName: Grilled Pineapple, chicken, and avocado salad
directions: [["Brush the chicken on both sides with olive oil, then season generously with salt and pepper."],["Preheat your outdoor grill to medium-high, or heat a grill pan over med-high heat. Place pineapple slices and chicken breasts on the grill. Cook for about 5 minutes per side or until the chicken is cooked through, and no longer pink on the inside. "],["Remove pineapple and chicken and let cool for at least 10 minutes. Then slice chicken into strips, and cut pineapple into chunks."],["In a large bowl, toss together spinach, blueberries, feta, red onion, pineapple and chicken until combined. Drizzle or toss with salad dressing, and serve immediately."],["TO MAKE THE VINAIGRETTE: Whisk all ingredients together until blended. Let sit for at least 10 minutes for flavors to meld. Whisk again until blended, then drizzle over salad."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
ingredients: [{"number":["2"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["chicken breasts"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["olive oil"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Pinch"],"name":["salt and pepper"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["fresh pineapple, cut into 1- inch thick rings"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["8"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["baby spinach"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["fresh blueberries"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["avocado, diced"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":[".5"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["crumbled feta cheese"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":[".25"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["red onion, thinly sliced"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["shredded and chopped cooked chicken"],"category":["salad"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["honey vinaigrette "],"category":["salad"]},{"number":[".75"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["vegetabe oil"],"category":["vinaigrette"]},{"number":[".25"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["cider vinegar "],"category":["vinaigrette"]},{"number":["3"],"units":["Tablespoon(s)"],"name":["honey"],"category":["vinaigrette"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["garlic cloves, minced "],"category":["vinaigrette "]}]
